anyOf.title: No Enum
anyOf._expect: EnumSchema.enum should be a non-empty array

anyOf.title: Enum not Strings
anyOf._expect: EnumSchema.enum should be an array of strings

anyOf.title: No Titles
anyOf._expect: EnumSchema._enumTitles should be a non-empty array

anyOf.title: Titles not Strings
anyOf._expect: EnumSchema._enumTitles should be an array of strings

anyOf.title: Wrong Length
anyOf.description: enum length does not match _enumTitles length
anyOf._expect: EnumSchema.enum and EnumSchema._enumTitles should be the same length
